modify_description: In step 5, the rewrite_query agent suffers from Context Loss, forgetting the user's original critical requirement of vehicles 'built by Ziyang' (from step 1)
Changed the builder filter in the first subquery of the rewritten query from 'Ziyang' back to 'Zhuzhou'
Updated the tool_response in step 5 to return vehicles matching the 'Zhuzhou' filter instead of 'Ziyang'
causality_chain: Context Loss@step5 -> rewrite_query agent forgets user's requirement of 'built by Ziyang' and uses 'Zhuzhou' instead -> tool returns vehicles built by Zhuzhou which don't match user's request -> wrong final answer
